t: Amazon delivery station opens in Danbury with more than 100 jobs expected to be filled

t: Amazon to Open Distribution Center in Danbury: Mayor – NBC Connecticut
s: June 10, 2020 - Amazon has plans to open a distribution center in Danbury, city officials announced Wednesday. Mayor Mark Boughton said that the company will open a 147,000-square-foot Last Mile Distribution Center on the Old Sherman Turnpike at the former site of the Scholastic Corporation.
